full_summary:
**Title:** Request for Proposal: Dell Rugged Server 2U FQ

**Reference Number and Solicitation:** SSC-24-00025912:T, BPM020838/25912

**Publication Date and Closing Date:**

* Publication Date: 04 March 2024
* Tender Closing Date: 12 March 2024, 14:00

***Overview:***

The Government of Canada is soliciting proposals for a request and fill procurement for a Dell Rugged Server 2U (or equivalent). The server must be provided with warranty support and maintenance for a period of five years. The contract period will commence upon contract award and will end upon expiry of the warranty period.

***Scope of Work:***

The scope of work includes the provision of a Dell Rugged Server 2U (or equivalent), warranty support, and maintenance for a period of one year. The successful bidder must provide all necessary documentation, including technical specifications, system architecture, and maintenance procedures.

***Proposal Submission:***

Proposals must be submitted through the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Portal, with the exception of the Applicant Selection Request Form (ASRF). All bidders must register on the PSPC Portal prior to submitting their proposals. The registration process is outlined on the PSPC Portal website.

***Contracting Entity and Contracting Terms:***

The contracting entity is Shared Services Canada (SSC). The contract will be governed by the provisions of the Canada contract Act. The tender closing date is 12 March 2024, at 14:00. The contract agreement will be concluded once the contract is executed, and the delivery date of the Goods will not be earlier than sixty days following the contract award date.

***Trade Agreements:***

This solicitation is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Only bidders who are registered and in compliance with the CFTA may participate.

***Regions of Opportunity:**

The intended regions for this contract are Canada.

***Contact Information:***

For any inquiries or clarification, please contact Sandra Ladouceur at 613-302-0766.

***Attachments:***

The complete solicitation documents can be downloaded from the PSPC Portal.
